channel.title: Vladimir Cezar
channel.description: Hacker. Christian. Pilot. Sailor. I build systems, fly when I can, and spend time at sea whenever I get the chance.

item.title: Why? How my career started
item.description: Learning BASIC on an 8-bit computer, discovering randomness, and getting hooked on computing.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Why this site exists and what you can expect.
